custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT si.* FROM htmsd_ShoppingItem si where NOT si.quantity = 0 AND si.status = 1 AND (si.name like ? OR si.productCode like ?) [$sort]

SELECT soi.* FROM htmsd_ShoppingOrderItem as soi INNER JOIN htmsd_ShoppingOrder as so ON soi.orderId = so.orderId AND so.orderId IN ([$ORDER_IDS$]) WHERE so.userId = ? order by so.createDate desc [$LIMIT$];
